entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-03-29
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Unable to uninstall .NET Core 2.1.30 Hosting Bundle #67315
  • [RyuJIT] Enable contained form for shlx, sarx, shrx #67314
    Future
  • string.StartsWith() displays unexpected behaviour on Unix? #67313
  • System.Text.json deserialize doesn't support case insensitive Hashset #67311
  • Support optional argument types in `ActivatorUtilities.CreateFactory` #67309
  • Unrecognized X509VerifyStatusCode:Interop+Crypto+X509VerifyStatusCode on RHEL 9/OpenSSL 3.0 #67304
  • IP protocol implementations which work in Windows do not work in Linux #67303
  • [QUIC] Rewrite Open(Uni|Bidi)rectionalStream to leverage async stream opening #67302
    7.0.0
  • [QUIC] IPv6 addresses don't work on Linux #67301
  • WasmBuildTests job failing workitem 'Workloads-.CleanTests' #67298
  • Downlevel (out-of-band nuget) version of System.Memory / ReadOnlySequence<T> doesn't work correctly with custom memory-managers #67295
  • The framework 'Microsoft.NETCore.App', version '6.0.0' (x64) was not found but 6.0.3 is installed #67293
  • Wasm: FS is not defined on .NET 7 Preview 2 #67290
  • Detached ProcessExit() make the main process exit at once with SIGTERM #67294
  • Public API Proposal: Make bool RuntimeHelpers.IsKnownConstant(...) public for all primitive types #67285
  • TimeZoneInfo doesn`t support Europeans identifiers (EET CET WET) #67296
  • .net framework, can't validate XML documents with an XML schema having targetNamespace #67283
  • [API Proposal]: Api handle Activity.Current value changes #67276
    7.0.0
  • Test failure System.Net.Http.Functional.Tests.TelemetryTest_Http20.EventSource_ConnectionPoolAtMaxConnections_LogsRequestLeftQueue #67273
    Future

Closed

  • [API Proposal]: Possibility to specify a custom naming for appsettings.json files #67142
  • DistributedCacheExtensions adds object caching methods #67237
  • Blazor WebAssembly build: "ImportError: DLL load failed while importing _ctypes: The specified module could not be found." #65859
  • [QUIC] Do not call msquic in a lock #59345
    7.0.0
  • Spilling can overwrite adjacent stack parameters on ARM64 macOS ABI #67188
    7.0.0
  • OSR failure in System.Text.Json.Tests #67152
    7.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Add Write method to JsonNamingPolicy #67284
  • Remove Spaces from GitHub Labels #62032
    7.0.0
  • HttpConnection roots user-provided write buffer in AwaitableSocketAsyncEventArgs #67096
    7.0.0
  • Count_Timeout_ThrowsAfterTooLongExecution test failure #67225
  • HTTP/3: Improve user experience when TLS 1.3 is not enabled on Windows #55237
    7.0.0
  • Assertion failed 'interval->isSpilled' during 'LSRA allocate' #66578
    7.0.0
  • Safe handle use after close in System.Net.Security.Tests #46770
    7.0.0
  • A delegate object is created for each IOptionsMonitor<T>.Get call #61086
    Future
  • [wasm] make emscripten symbols exportable #65436
    7.0.0
  • Use TimeSpan everywhere we use an int for seconds, milliseconds, and timeouts #14336
    Future
  • HTTP Headers are enumerated in the wrong order when added via a mix of parsed and unparsed APIs #63831
    7.0.0
  • String.Compare() Can not work in .Net 6 #67275
  • Finally blocks not always ran on thrown exception #65657
  • Remove `IsEmpty` workaround in `Span` and `ReadOnlySpan` #64514

PullRequests

Created

  • [IGNORE][wasm] Add perf-manual pipeline #67312
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Quote file path in rc file #67307
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Show the actual value of the X09VerifyStatusCode on error #67306
    area-System.Security, community-contribution
  • Suppressing RequiresDynamicCodeAttribute for Compiled Regex #67299
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • Run fuzzers on macOS arm64 #67297
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Enable recently added analyzers (and fix some violations) #67292
    area-Meta
  • [release/6.0] Fix DNS cancellation deadlock #67291
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Net
  • Detect systemd when inside a container. #67288
    area-Extensions-Hosting
  • [draft] Use csel for conditional moves #67286
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix SuperPMI implementation of `appendClassName` #67280
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono][llvm] Remove support for llvm 9.x, the 11.x support is stable … #67277
    area-Codegen-LLVM-mono

Merged

  • skip adding leaf certificate to ChainPolicy.ExtraStore #67279
    area-System.Net.Security, os-windows
  • Fix a couple of issues with StackTraceSymbols.TryGetReader #67300
  • [wasm] Unset PYTHONHOME #67282
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Do not call into MsQuic inside a lock #67037
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • JIT: Use small register types for some enregisterable locals #67274
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm] Dead code removal, minor fixes #66418
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.0
  • Fix a case of infinite retries while allocating at LOH boundary by constraining retries #67128
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Introduce abstract PartitionedRateLimiter #67241
    area-System.Threading, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • Increase timeout on regex count test #67256
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • Improve `QuicImplementationProviders.MsQuic.IsSupported` for TLS1.3 On Windows #66019
    area-System.Net.Quic, community-contribution
  • Perform reachability analysis before codegen #66967
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Avoid allocating a delegate in OptionsMonitor.Get() when possible. #66688
    area-Extensions-Options, community-contribution
  • Only use first field maps for shared statics #66558
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono][workload] add workloads for win-arm64 using emulation again #67267
    area-Build-mono
  • feat: Add support for emscripten module exports #66868
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, community-contribution
  • [wasm] provisioning: run sanitize.py with python3 #67245
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Fixed dump path in HTTP stress test #67230
    area-System.Net.Http
  • [wasm] Fix error when provisioning with python 3.8. #67287
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Remove `ToTimeoutSeconds`.`SendPingAsync` and fix `TimeSpan` behavior #67253
    area-System.Net, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [Group 4] Enable nullable annotations for `Microsoft.Extensions.Http` #66891
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-HttpClientFactory
  • Preserve parsed & raw header value ordering #67227
    area-System.Net.Http, 7.0.0
  • [mono] Remove mono-perfcounters.c and most of mono-counters.c #66986
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Account for renamed Pri-0 tests #67278
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Add log to file option to createdump #67181
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Add support for creating delegates to static virtual methods #66936
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • JIT: refactor IsOSRLocal #67247
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add \<para> tags to remarks comments #67173
    area-System.IO.Compression
  • [wasm] Attempt to fix audit errors in sanitize #67255
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Remove `IsEmpty` workaround in `Span` and `ReadOnlySpan` #66865
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • Allow mismatched assembly name and file name #67220
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr

Updated

  • Publish crossgen as AOT if supported by the target platform #65948
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • WIP: switch over JIT/Methodical tests to run using merged wrappers #65597
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • [PERF][MAUI] Update maui iOS build sed command #67263
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Design to support ByRefLike types in Generics #67129
    area-TypeSystem-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • [RyuJIT] Emit shlx, sarx, shrx on x64 and x86 #67182
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Use ROS<byte> instead of byte[] where it makes sense on S.S.C.Cose #66741
    area-System.Security, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • Enable QJFL and OSR by default for x64 and arm64 #65675
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Morph `ASG(ONE_FLD_STRUCT, CALL)` using `BITCAST` #61049
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Use a simpler representation for array addresses after morph #64581
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Make the cross-component build just another invocation of the build-runtime script #67108
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 1689101 #67177
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Nullable annotations for System.Security.Cryptography.Xml #67198
    area-System.Security, community-contribution
  • Use the stapled OCSP response from TLS, when available. #67011
    area-System.Security, 7.0.0
  • Clean-up CacheEntry #59110
    area-Extensions-Caching, community-contribution
  • Added tests for changing a list size being iterated on (#65608) #65615
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution
  • Load R2R images on osx-arm64 according to Apple's guidelines #67118
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • perf: wasm: Collect helix logs, and artifacts when the build fails #67248
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [wasm][debugger] Debug on firefox #61776
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Reflection Invoke refactoring to support future byref-like and IL emit features #66357
    area-System.Reflection, 7.0.0
  • Multiple enveloped signatures #67010
    area-System.Security, community-contribution
  • [draft] JSImportGenerator #66304
    NO-REVIEW, arch-wasm, new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.0
  • [IGNORE][wasm] debugging perf/wasm/aot #66973
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, arch-wasm
  • Use shared SocketAddress code in QUIC #66794
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • Changing the logic for how we deal with RegexOptions.IgnoreCase matching. #67184
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • Update breaking-change-rules.md #66978
    documentation, area-Meta, needs-author-action
  • Change ConfigurationBinder to avoid reading properties unnecessarily. #66723
    area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution
  • Fix Missing Metadata for ThreadPool Event #67150
    area-System.Diagnostics.Tracing, 7.0.0
  • Account for global stores in hoisting properly #67213
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [release/6.0] Add a --aot-lazy-assembly-load command line option to load assemblies #67103
    Servicing-approved, area-Codegen-AOT-mono, 6.0.5
  • [release/6.0] Add dynamic shim for SSL_CTX_set_options and SSL_set_options #67145
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Security, 6.0.5
  • [Mono] Fix warnings to enable W4 on Windows. #66710
    os-windows, area-Build-mono
  • Makes GetChildKeys more efficient #67186
    area-Extensions-Configuration
  • Improve exception thrown when constructing SslCertificateTrust #66763
  • [debugger] First draft of managed debugger on wasi #67272
    area-Debugger-mono
  • Do not generate `TYP_STRUCT` `LCL_FLD` nodes #66251
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • [API Implementation]: SafeFileHandle overloads for SetCreationTime, SetLastAccessTime, SetLastWriteTime #60507
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Add basic fake NTLM server to test NTAuthentication round-trip scenarios #65611
    area-System.Net.Security, community-contribution
  • Linux-bionic (Android libc w/o Android interop) initial implementation #66147
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [wasm][debugger] Debuger tests refactor 63667 #63730
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • [wasm][debugger] Sort properties by protection level in structures. #63339
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono, 7.0.0
  • Add current-outgoing-connect-attempts counter to Sockets #66651
    area-System.Net.Sockets, 7.0.0
  • [mono] Fix read of image_info while raising image_unload event #67138
    area-System.Diagnostics-mono, community-contribution
  • Avoid pre-allocating large arrays in some scenarios for Enumerable.Chunk #67210
    area-System.Linq, community-contribution
  • Add CipherSuitesPolicy support for MsQuic #67239
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • Run illink before ApiCompat #66706
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, blocked, linkable-framework
  • Remove ternary workaround for string.IsNullOrEmpty #63095
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • JIT: Optimize range checks for X >> CNS and for short/byte indices #67141
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • System.Runtime no longer needs to enable preview features #67162
    area-System.Runtime, 7.0.0
  • [release/6.0] Avoid issuing connection attempts for already cancelled requests #67226
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Net.Http, 6.0.x
  • JIT: Refactor call argument representation #67238
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [debugger][wasm] ValueTypeClass refactoring. #63626
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • [API Implementation]: DirectoryInfo.CopyTo / Directory.Copy #62375
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Single-file debugging support in DBI and createdump #67163
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Remove the Unix code from `System.Drawing.Common`. #64623
    area-System.Drawing, community-contribution
